summary: VIVA IMPACT Homepage Redesign - 'Split Hero Clean + Portal Mario' fully tested on desktop (1440px, 1920px) and mobile (390px). All core features working correctly. Mario displays seamlessly without white border/frame using radial CSS mask. Split layout properly renders with title left and Mario right on desktop, stacked vertically on mobile.
